name: Germany's Next Topmodel 2011
overview: Top optics, exciting mini games, emotional story, multiplayer mode and the original stars from the show: "Germany's next top model" 2011 is the best top model game of all time! The model simulation for the successful ProSieben show not only relies on an excellent look - the inner values are also convincing: Varied mini-games spur on new top performances on the catwalk, in the gym or in front of the make-up mirror. In the eight weeks until the big final show, you will experience exciting adventures in the "Germany's next top model" house, make friends and engage in heated discussions. How you behave in conversations influences your relationships with your competitors and your popularity with viewers. Only those who have strong nerves and a lot of power get the chance to become "Germany's next top model"! Features: - Like on TV: Spend eight exciting weeks in the "Germany's next top model" house and prove yourself on international catwalks from Paris to New York. - Meet the models from previous seasons: Lena Gercke, Sara Nuru, Mandy Bork, Marie Nasemann. and Larissa Marolt - Prove yourself in many varied games: e.g. photo shoot, catwalk, yoga, boxing and styling. - Challenge your friends: In the brand new multiplayer mode you compete against other players in the most exciting minigames - Supports the Wii Balance Board
